builders.shell:
- step1: &step1_data
    subitem1: data1
    subitem2: data2
    subitem3: data3
- step2:
    otheritem1: dummy1
    otheritem2: dummy2
    otheritem3: dummy3
- step3: *step1_data

#!/bin/bash
#
# Sample script showing how the yaml include-raw tag can be used
# to inline scripts that are maintained outside of the jenkins
# job yaml configuration.

echo "hello world"

exit 0
